name: Nick Cage's Face Off 2: Transferance
description:
Inspired by Face-Off, imagine a world where you can swap out your eyes, nose, or lips to look more happy, sad, or neutral. Don't imagine it too long, you really shouldn't. People come in wanting new faces and you just so happen to be the one to give it to them. (Best experienced in full-screen).

WINNER OF THE "But... Why?" AWARD!

Features include:

  • Intense Gameplay. Face swapping gameplay under extreme pressure.
  • Face-off! Swappable faces to create the "perfect/terrifying" face of your dreams.
  • Leaderboard! Impress (or scare) your friends and strangers with your highest score.
  • Clown Horn Music. Need I say more?
